english.segment1: When I'm alone with You Lord. My troubles seem to disappear. And the peace that comforts me. Always comes when You are near. And Your love's too much for my heart to contain. Joy too much that my feet won't refrain
english.segment2: So I dance like the rain on the roof. Tell my soul that my spirit's on the loose. Don't know if anyone will understand. Feels like an angel's got a hold of my hand. So I dance. I dance I dance I dance
english.segment3: When I think about the ways. That You have blessed my life. I sing a song of praise and thankful tears fill my eyes. 'Cause Your love's too much for my heart to contain. Joy too much that my feet won't refrain
